channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 05:25 Air anxiety in Kirovohrad Oblast Watch Further Messages.
item.description: 游댮 05:25 Air anxiety in Kirovohrad Oblast Watch Further Messages.#Kirovograd_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
